statements: SELECT * FROM coach_feedback;
SELECT coach_name, athlete_name, strategy FROM coach_feedback WHERE feedback_id = 1;
SELECT athlete_name, feedback_text FROM coach_feedback WHERE coach_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM coach_feedback WHERE athlete_name = 'Alice Smith' AND strategy = 'Defensive';
SELECT game_plan FROM coach_feedback WHERE feedback_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM coach_feedback WHERE feedback_id = 1;
SELECT coach_name, athlete_name, feedback_text FROM coach_feedback WHERE strategy = 'Aggressive';
SELECT coach_name, athlete_name, game_plan FROM coach_feedback WHERE coach_name = 'John' AND athlete_name = 'Alice';
SELECT feedback_id, coach_name, athlete_name FROM coach_feedback WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%improve%';
SELECT AVG(feedback_id) AS avg_id, AVG(LENGTH(feedback_text)) AS avg_feedback_length FROM coach_feedback;
SELECT * FROM coach_feedback
SELECT coach_name, feedback_date FROM coach_feedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC
SELECT feedback_text FROM coach_feedback WHERE coach_name = 'John Smith'
SELECT coach_name, feedback_date, feedback_text FROM coach_feedback WHERE feedback_date >= '2021-01-01'
SELECT coach_name, strategy_name FROM coach_feedback JOIN performance_strategies ON coach_feedback.feedback_id = performance_strategies.coach_id
SELECT * FROM coach_feedback WHERE feedback_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY feedback_date DESC
SELECT coach_name, feedback_text FROM coach_feedback WHERE coach_name = 'John Smith'
SELECT feedback_id, coach_name, feedback_date FROM coach_feedback WHERE feedback_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT coach_name, COUNT(feedback_id) AS total_feedbacks FROM coach_feedback GROUP BY coach_name HAVING total_feedbacks > 3
SELECT p.strategy_id, p.strategy_name, c.coach_name FROM performance_strategies p INNER JOIN coach_feedback c ON p.coach_id = c.feedback_id
SELECT * FROM coach_feedback;
SELECT coach_name, feedback_text FROM coach_feedback WHERE feedback_id = 1;
SELECT strategy_name FROM strategies ORDER BY strategy_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM game_plans WHERE plan_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT plan_id, plan_details FROM game_plans WHERE plan_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT * FROM coach_feedback WHERE coach_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT feedback_id, coach_name, feedback_text FROM coach_feedback WHERE feedback_id > 10 ORDER BY coach_name DESC;
SELECT strategy_name, description FROM strategies WHERE strategy_id BETWEEN 5 AND 10 ORDER BY strategy_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM game_plans WHERE LENGTH(plan_details) > 100 ORDER BY plan_name ASC;
SELECT plan_name, CHAR_LENGTH(plan_details) AS details_length FROM game_plans WHERE plan_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM coach_feedback;
SELECT coach_name, player_name, feedback_text FROM coach_feedback WHERE id = 1;
SELECT strategy_name, description FROM strategies WHERE id = 3;
SELECT plan_name, strategy_id, player_id FROM game_plans ORDER BY player_id DESC;
SELECT player_id, improvement_area, improvement_score FROM performance_improvement WHERE improvement_score > 75;
SELECT * FROM coach_feedback WHERE coach_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT player_name, feedback_text FROM coach_feedback WHERE id = 3;
SELECT strategy_name, description FROM strategies WHERE id = 1;
SELECT plan_name, player_id FROM game_plans WHERE strategy_id = 2 ORDER BY player_id DESC;
SELECT player_id, improvement_area, improvement_score FROM performance_improvement WHERE improvement_score > 80 AND player_id = 5 ORDER BY improvement_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM Players;
SELECT player_name, player_position FROM Players WHERE player_team='Team A';
SELECT coach_name, coach_experience_years FROM Coaches ORDER BY coach_experience_years DESC;
SELECT game_plan_name, game_plan_description FROM GamePlans WHERE player_id=1;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM CoachFeedback WHERE feedback_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT coach_name, coach_team, coach_specialty FROM Coaches WHERE coach_experience_years > 10;
SELECT player_name, player_team, player_position FROM Players WHERE player_age BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY player_name ASC;
SELECT game_plan_name, game_plan_description, game_plan_date FROM GamePlans WHERE player_id = 5 AND game_plan_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY game_plan_date DESC;
SELECT strategy_name, strategy_description, strategy_category FROM Strategies WHERE player_id = 3 AND strategy_category = 'Offensive' ORDER BY strategy_name ASC;
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date, coach_id FROM CoachFeedback WHERE player_id = 7 AND feedback_date < NOW() ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
